question.title: How to disable certain certificate types in Java SSL handshake
question.body:
I have a Spring Boot 3.4.10 application written in Java 25 that authenticates via an SSL handshake. I'm using server.ssl.bundle to setup TLS within Spring Boot.

The snippet below is from the server hello, captured with Wireshark, looking at PCAP traces of the Java TLS handshake:

Certificate types (3 types)
    Certificate type: ECDSA Sign (64)
    Certificate type: RSA Sign (1)
    Certificate type: DSS Sign (2)

I would like to disable DSS Sign.

I've already disabled some handshake signature algorithms, according to this post: How to disable certain handshake features

However, I didn't find any related settings in java.security file according to certificate types. How can I disable DSS Sign?
